website_summaries.verdict: May not fill you up at every meal, but it's a tasty breakfast bar offered at a decent price.
pros: Comes in a variety of flavors, such as honey oat, blueberry almond, and peanut butter
A bit more than 200 calories per serving (calories vary depending on the flavor), so it'll give you a good start to the day in terms of staying on track with your diet
cons: Not a lot of protein, so it may not satisfy your mid-day hunger

customer_reviews.title: peanut butter bars
customer_reviews.text: I usually order the blueberry kind bars, or the chocolate ones, but decided to try the peanut butter ones for a change. I don't know if the few boxes i got were from a bad batch, or they are all like that, but they were super hard and, and very difficult to chew. They only had a slight peanut taste, and overall the taste was not that good. They are really bland and tasteless. I am kinda disappointed, because I really like some of their other flavors, so I'll stick to them for now.
customer_reviews.author: sammy1

customer_reviews.title: Taste.... different
customer_reviews.text: Call me crazy. These taste flavorless and different than the ones I routinely buy at the store. Too bad.. because these are like $2 less a box.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard
customer_reviews.text: Before buying the product I read reviews that said the bars were too hard, stale, and tasteless. Well so glad I didn't let these reviews discourage me from buying the bars. I found that they are not too hard and mine were fresh. As far as taste goes, no they are not going to taste like homemade peanut butter cookies. They are protein bars. I could taste the peanutbutter flavor. Good bars. I will be buying more. And the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: V. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Loyal Customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product especially the price. I don’t feel that I am being taken advantage of when it comes to the price. None of my product was out of date. I will always support them as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these bars he rapes about them. He says that it feels him up enough in the morning that he doesn't get hungry until lunch time and he has a very physical job. And the value for the money is exceptional when you do subscribe and save. They have a fantastic taste and they're made very well without a lot of garbage in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A. Marandino

customer_reviews.title: A good product but...
customer_reviews.text: I like these breakfast bars. They are low on preservatives and fresh tasting with a good texture. However some of 1/2 dozen boxes I bought from Amazon were approaching there recommended sell by date and some of them were beyond the sell by date. They were dried out and hard as rocks. I would recommend paying a bit more and buying this product locally.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying online...
customer_reviews.text: Someone gave me one of these bars and I loved it and went searching for more. Didn’t see them in my supermarket so I ordered them here. Sadly, they were totally stale and kind of tasteless. I didn’t even finish the box.
customer_reviews.author: Adina M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on-the-go breakfast
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic breakfast bars. They aren't too sweet and aren't too crunchy, just in between on both counts. Each pack has 2 bars, which appears to be one serving. They are delicious with tea or coffee. We keep a box by the front door so hungry people can grab one on the way to work or school,
customer_reviews.author: hownow

customer_reviews.title: Stale product
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy here, stale product. I have purchased these from at least three different stores and they were great! I won't order them here again.
customer_reviews.author: RENEE M

customer_reviews.title: I didn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: I am a big peanut butter fan and love a lot of peanut butter based breakfasts. After seeing the CEO of Kind on Shark Tank made me want to try his products. I was really hoping it would been good but found the flavour to be very unappealing. I just tossed it out because I don't think even the homeless would want to eat this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Weinraub

customer_reviews.title: Great Breakfast
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for an early AM MTB ride. Grab a flask of coffee and a pack of bars and have the energy to ride for three hours. Tasty, good texture and adequate for a quick meal. Nothing to dislike. They were a fantastic deal for $2.49 (pkg of four) and a good deal for $3.99.

customer_reviews.title: 2 Months passed the “Best By” date.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve decided not to purchase these from Amazon again, unless they can guarantee the best by date has not expired. My last order of three boxes were 2 months passed the best by date. Though, I know it’s fine to still eat them, I prefer not to purchase something that has already expired, because I have a sensitive stomach and expect not have to be concerned about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: GDW

customer_reviews.title: always in my desk drawer
customer_reviews.text: These bars mostly taste of oatmeal with a little peanut butter. I keep them in my desk for when i miss lunch or I work late. I like them because they're filling and no one would mistake them for cookies. They're not awful, but I only eat them when I'm truly hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Not her real name

customer_reviews.title: Buy these in the store instead!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packs of these and they were so disgusting and they expire next month. They taste VERY different from store bought bars. Will stick to buying these in the store than from amazon. Very disappointed and I don’t recommend buying these on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket for a fast breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I have a limited choice of foods that I can eat not only because of IBS, but for GERD, and an irritable stomach. As long as I eat within my diet, I am fine. This Fits! No wheat, no HFC, no chocolate, good nutritious, good tasting, filling food. Goes good with green tea too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you like having broken teeth
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these in our local grocery store. The are fresh and flavorful. These from Amzon are dry, hard as a rock, an flavorless it is a crying shame that this poor quality product is allowed to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer m

customer_reviews.title: I love them and I HATE peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I know this makes absolutely no sense and I'm not sure why I even tried them in the first place. But I love them and they're not filled with tons of chemicals. I keep them in my car, at work, in my bag. It's the perfect snack and so easy to grab while I'm on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Flynt58

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and filling
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite breakfast bars! They are very filling. I eat half a package (one bar out of two) in the morning before I teach online for a few hours. It sticks with me and gives me energy to teach. I'm usually not hungry until a few hours after I've eaten one. My family has started eating these as well. My husband and sons (7 and 5) enjoy these just as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Okay Tasting, Low Sodium, low Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, these aren't the greatest tasting bars out there, but they were cheap, low on sodium and sugar which I needed for health reasons, so they're good for shoving in my backpack on long days and reasonably filling.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina S.

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter Breakfast Bar
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are not very sweet Most are too sweet IMO. They remind me somewhat of less sugar peanut butter cookies. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: CDC

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these for the first time and really like them. They have a great flavor! Wish you got more than 4 in a box, but will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl K

customer_reviews.title: Love these breakfast bars.
customer_reviews.text: I love these breakfast bars. They taste great and make a great substitute for the usual breakfast items. Sometimes I'll have one (2 are in each package) for an evening snack. Highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i’m addicted to these bars!
customer_reviews.text: i think i could live on these bars. i don’t eat gluten so these satisfy my peanut butter cookie cravings! they’re pretty filling for a protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars but won’t order from Amazon again. They tasted stale & were definitely at the end of their shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Book-a-day

customer_reviews.title: Filling good , quick snack.
customer_reviews.text: These bars smell like a peanut butter sandwich very good and tasty, these bars are not overly sweet, and they are very filling.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I can't keep these stocked in the cupboard. I begin to wonder if the family is giving them away they go so fast :) They're a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Kind does not use a lot of preservatives and I feel like they are relatively healthy in a world of processed foods. They taste really good too.
customer_reviews.author: glosing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bar
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Kind bars. These are the best of the breakfast bars.
customer_reviews.author: Clay E.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal I’ve purchased several cases. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MrGolf

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I carry these in my purse to snack on while I am out driving and need something to eat instead of using a drive thru
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Love these...perfect size, easy to keep and consume. Great taste, healthy.
customer_reviews.author: CelticGeisha

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are great to take on a trip to satisfy your snack needs. I keep some in my purse, just in case. Some other brands are too sweet and high calorie. KIND is just right.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: I live these for breakfast, keeps me full and gives energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I often use these for a quick lunch if traveling or shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Mouffette

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: So good and tasty great for a good snack. Good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan the flavor did not entice me to finish the bar so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan the flavor did not entice me to finish the bar so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: YourKatNippers

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a healthy alternatives to cookies. Like it a great deal. Tastes good, not hard or stale. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: H. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Stale and very hard.
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite Kind Breakfast Bars, but all four boxes we recieved were stale and very hard. We didn’t eat them. Sadly disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Katie Host

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of these. They are great for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like to have these bars for breakfast! Sometimes they are a little to crunchy when they arrive but usually their a good texture.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I love Kind breakfast bars, and this flavor, and the oats and honey, are my top flavors
customer_reviews.author: NewProf

customer_reviews.title: Great price, much better than grocery store price
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my husband and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Naturally good snack
customer_reviews.text: Family likes these, they are crunchy and soft. There flavor is kind of bland, but I like because it doesn't have artificial flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Healthy breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Kind bars but their breakfast bars were a little dry. Other breakfast bars are more soft & moist. Not too sweet , 2 in a package & a good bar for the morning. However, on a shipping note, I had other items in the box but only the Kind box was crushed! It didn't affect the bars at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yabba dee

customer_reviews.title: Good bars
customer_reviews.text: These are actually very tasty. I with they had some that were a little softer, though. I'll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Hard and inedible!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these many times from different grocery stores and loved them! This box was the same flavor but they were extremely hard! Could barely chew them :(
customer_reviews.author: K Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: PEANUT BUTTER?
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. Didnt even taste any peanut butter!
customer_reviews.author: CARLACAT

customer_reviews.title: Decent breakfast replacement
customer_reviews.text: Got these for when my kids need a breakfast on the go. Tasty and filling.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Breakfast Bar
customer_reviews.text: One package of two will hold me until lunch time. Good tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Bobsgarage

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are so good, I look forward to having them in the mornings and they keep me full for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love these for an easy breakfast. Great price as add on product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting.
customer_reviews.text: Has a balance of nuts, peanut butter, grains and lots of fiber.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: not too sweet and keep you full
customer_reviews.text: My new go-to breakfast bars! They aren't super sweet like other brands and keep you full through lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Teach4Peace

customer_reviews.title: I am very sad that I can't order more
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these, they are so incredibly yummy! I am very sad that I can't order more!
customer_reviews.author: Happylexy

customer_reviews.title: Very Peanut Buttery!
customer_reviews.text: My husband really enjoys the peanut butter taste in these Kind Bars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L.

customer_reviews.title: Do better Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The product boxes were completely destroyed and bent. It looked like they had been kicked and thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Kristee Goward

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and great for taking out on our boat for snack or breakfast meal for a day of fishing.
customer_reviews.author: phylmore

customer_reviews.title: If you love that Organic Peanut Butter taste
customer_reviews.text: If you love that Organic Peanut Butter taste, this is the bar for you, as the peanut butter flavor is the only ingredient you can taste.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzle

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy but!
customer_reviews.text: Kind bars are great for breakfast! Less money in Stop and Shop.
customer_reviews.author: John316

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick snack!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick healthy snack. Great price and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: KLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Tasted stale
customer_reviews.text: This product was very hard and dry, and didn't have much flavor at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Using this on my current and I have to say that this definitely works for me. Flavor could be a little more stronger though.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Kind Bar
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and for the price I found them on here, cant beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Love the Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to the Peanut Butter. These were priced better than my grocery store too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they are hard to find in store.
customer_reviews.author: nribb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for breakfast, more filling than a regular Kind bar
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Schiessl

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Yummy, goes with coffee. Just eat 1 cookie at a time or might cause diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: mollylulu

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I eat this healthy snack very often at home or on the go. They taste good and give me energy.
customer_reviews.author: AyeSea56

product_meta.title: KIND Breakfast Bar, Peanut Butter, 1.8oz 4 Count, 7.1oz
product_meta.description: KIND Breakfast Bar Peanut Butter - 4 CT
feature_bullets: Peanut butter breakfast bars are made with a unique blend of ingredients
Including five super grains coated in peanut butter
Each 50 serving has 19g of whole grains
